issue.title: [Feature]: Training and testing splitting.
issue.body:
### Feature Request

Good morning everyone, 

I am new to PySR, so apologies if the questions I place are naiive.
I was wondering if there is any way to have an automatic "training and testing" split, and for training I mean the value for fitting, while for testing unseen data on which the loss can be calculated. 

I am trying to implement this feature for my project, and I see that `model.predict()` evaluates the input based on the equation chosen by `model_selection`. Is there any way of evaluating the expression also on other candidate functions?

Thank you for your help!
